
# #SaveUkrainianFolk: NFT Smart contract

The smart contract uses ERC721A standard to describe collection of 150 FOLKS - one-hour mixtape of Ukrainian folk music.

The project is bootstrapped with Node.js and Hardhat, tested with Waffle and Chai, deployed with Ethers.js, Alchemy and Metamask.


## Installation

```bash
  git clone https://github.com/SaveUkrainianFolk/nft.git
  cd nft
  npm ci
```

## Running Tests

```bash
  npx hardhat test
```
